item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Foundry Tools (rebrand from Azure AI Services)
item.description:
Microsoft announced Foundry Tools (rebranded from Azure AI Services) as generally available â€” a unified suite of prebuilt, production-ready AI capabilities for audio, video, images, documents, and text, seamlessly integrated into the Microsoft Foundry platform to empower developers.
